entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of showers. Low 8. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of showers this evening and after midnight. Showers beginning after midnight. Wind east 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low 8. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Sunday 7 May 2023
